name: Sky to Fly: Soulless Leviathan
description: Sky to Fly: Soulless Leviathan is a sequel to the legendary steampunk action runner. Upon learning of the impending attack on Vetropolis, the main hero has decided to become an Agent, but the corrupt authorities want to stop him.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8.1 Processor: Intel Pentium 2.9 Ghz or analog Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 512 Mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space

reviews.review_text: It's pretty. It's cheap (especially so if on sale). It's  painful  to read.   Doublooms, piastres...! Something useful anyway   We have to tell the Masked Man that Dana is alive! Why don't we drop in to him and then deliver the box. I wonder what's inside...'  There are better racing games to play.  While it shouldn't factor into  this  game much, its a fraction of a larger game that's been chopped up into smaller episodes that are just a repackaging of the same engine.
